section.section: To the extent that funds are available for this purpose, the Secretary, in collaboration with other State agencies, shall establish and promote a statewide public information, awareness, and education campaign on Fetal Alcohol Syndrome and other effects of prenatal alcohol exposure.

text.section:
To carry out this section, the Secretary:
On request, shall receive aid or information from any agency of this State, or from a political subdivision;
May request the services of interested advocacy groups; and
May contract for any necessary services.
